review: Just love this product. No more whining of my kid, I stream all the cartoons he want from the youtube. And I am also able to view all the fun clips on youtube all at once in a bigger screen on our TV.
author: Sanghyun Kim

review: Product works great!  Just had some difficulty setting up my laptop with google Chrome and Chromcast. But I'm not the greatest when it comes to solving problems on a PC.... Absolutley worth every penny!
author: Dan Binando

review: Seems to work well with U-tube but not so well with other movie/programs
author: Carl Chatfield

review: Great inexpensive way to stream content to your non-smart TV! I have a few in my house! Super easy to set up and I never have had any problems.
author: Eric Hickman

review: It's functional, and get the job done in most cases, but I don't like that it's incompatible with the 5G wifi band, or that it transmits as it's own AP. I get that it's to "simplify" setup, but it makes me nervous from a network security standpoint, and doesn't work on my Cisco AP with it's default (secure) setup. I would prefer to see a more conventional networking configuration for this device.
author: ienstein

review: THIS IS A GREAT PRODUCT. HOWEVER, YOU MUST KNOW THAT IT WILL HAVE TO BE WITHING 10-15 FEET OF YOUR ROUTER OR IT WILL NOT WORK. I BOUGHT ONE FOR MY TV AND IT WORKS JUST FINE BUT THEN, I BOUGHT ONE FOR A FRIEND'S AND HER TV IS IN THE LIVING ROOM AND HER ROUTER IS IN THE BEDROOM ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE HOUSE AND IT DOESN'T WORK. I CALLED THEIR CUSTOMER SERVICE AND THEY SAID THAT'S NORMAL. IF THE ROUTER IS MORE THAN 15 FEET AWAY, IT WON'T WORK.
author: The Bee

review: we love throwing whatever we are watching on our cell phone onto the tv.  got one for each tv in our house!
author: Annie O'Reilly

review: Streaming is great, beats DVD's in the mail.
author: Mike Kearns
